item.description:
Join players of all levels as we play some games of Tennis. We will do our best to match players of similar skill levels to keep the games competitive yet fun. We are here to have fun, get to know each other and play tennis.

This is all about playing! If you would like more of an Open Tennis set-up in which you can play or just rally please let us know. This afternoon we are playing tennis, whether it be singles or doubles or round-robin play.

*Who: Anyone who is able to play games of Tennis. (All levels - Beginners, Advanced Beginners, Intermediate and Advanced Players)
*What: A Fall afternoon of tennis, a great exercise!
*When: Saturday 3:00-5:00pm
*Where: Braintree High School
*Why: Tennis is a fun and great form of exercise!

Saturday, September 26th@ 3:00pm
Braintree High School Tennis Courts
128 Town Street
Braintree, MA 02184


*Meeting Place: At the tennis courts entrance nearest the backboards.

*Event Organizer(s): Chandra

*Cost: $2/Member, $3/Guest, Annual Members are Free

*Min/Max: Minimum of 5 Yes RSVPs by deadline. There is no max.

*Guests: Welcome! Up to 2 per member.

*RSVP Deadline: 5:00pm Friday, September 25th
*Please Note in your RSVP Comments your anticipated arrival time and level of play.

In Case of Inclement Weather:
If it is raining the event will be cancelled. Heavy rains will cancel. **Please check back here (or the Talk About It section below) for an update on weather conditions.**

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions are posted on the "Directions to Frequently Used Venues" Discussion Thread on the Message Board.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll either be on the courts or at the entrance nearest the practice boards.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday AfternoonTennis
